txt.en: Many fellow monsters will offer quests and information. Right-Click a monster with an Eye of Sauron icon to receive or advance a quest.
Many fellow monsters will offer quests and information. Right-click a monster with a ring icon to receive or advance a quest.
Many characters will offer quests and information. Right-Click a character with a ring icon to receive or advance a quest.

Many characters and even objects will offer quests and information. <rgb=#FFFF00>Right-click</rgb> anyone or anything with a ring icon to receive or advance a quest. \nBlue quest rings tell you that the NPC may have helpful reminders of what you need to be doing.\nEpic Story quests will have a flaming ring to signify the importance of the quest for the main story line.
